name: Aggro-Culture
description:
Defend your harvest from the hordes! You have been tasked with growing as much wheat as possible to supply to a village. Unfortunately, some bugs smelled your crops and have decided to try to snack on them! Grow other plants to defend your wheat and protect your food until winter.

You determine how the waves get more difficult by choosing between options at the end of a round! As you go through the seasons options will get stronger and stronger

🎮 Controls

- Left click - Used to click things and to drag plants from their button to soil

- Right click - Pan around the field

💬 Post Jam

We will be pushing post jam versions of the game after Ludum Dare! Join our discord to follow development and hang out with us! :) https://discord.gg/JqmaaY32Kt

👤 Credits

  • Ategon - Coding & UI Animations
  • Icecubegame - Coding
  • Nny - Coding
  • Vulkaara - Art
  • DeanAbadPixels - Art
  • WolfMeryX - Sound
  • Coeur - Sound

Make sure to drop a rating and give feedback in the comments! It greatly helps with improving the game and making better games in the future
